note: I am a specialist in communication strategies, branding and storytelling applied to innovation. In 2003 I published a book of short stories (Amanecer, Penguin Random House, ISBN 9562621782). I have worked as a senior copywriter in Young&Rubicam Brands and OMG. I have a Master's Degree in Communication from the International University of La Rioja, Spain. Since 2011 I run a creative consultancy. I live in Chile, South America.
